entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C

Observed at: White Rock 10:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
